amendatorysection.catchline: Generator; failure to fulfill responsibilities; effect.
amendatorysection.para: If a generator of low-level radioactive waste fails to fulfill its financial or regulatory responsibilities under either the Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact or the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Act, the wastes generated by that generator shall not be received for disposal at the facility until the obligations are fulfilled.

crossreference.para: Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact, withdrawal, see section 71-3522.
